doc.repnme: Transcript of three hundred fourth regular meeting of Executive Directors, held on Thursday, November 13, 1958 : South Africa - Fifth Transport Project, Austria - Aschach Hydropower Project, Luxembourg - Viandem Pumped Storage Hydro Power Project
doc.abstracts: This partial transcript, from the session of the Executive Directors held on Thursday, November 13, 1958, covers only three proposed loans to: South Africa for the Fifth Transport Project; to Austria for the Aschach Hydropower Project; and to Luxembourg for the Viandem Pumped Storage Hydro Power Project. All three loans represent joint operations in which a Bank loan is arranged in conjunction with public offerings of bonds by the borrowers on the New York market. This meeting focused on the terms of the public issues and scheduled final loan approvals for a future session. In addition, a legislative issue regarding the Luxembourg project was discussed.
